errors.home: Unable to load sequences at this time

auth.message: Sign in with Google to keep your drafts private and share with attribution.
auth.subtitle: Sign in to access the beta

contact.directChannelsDescription: Connect with us on social platforms or send an email directly.
contact.replyTime: We will get back to you ASAP
contact.welcomeDescription: Have questions about the sequence explorer, encountering issues, or just want to say hello? Reach out directly or send a message below.

navigation.exploreDescription: Every Sequence tells a story through frames

onboarding.description: Follow this quick checklist to get your first sequence live.

create.description: Start a new sequence and outline the frames you want to tell your story.
create.title: Create a Sequence

run.description: Click on any Sequence Card To View The Story
run.title: View a Sequence

share.description: Click on the share icon on the bottom right of every Sequence card
share.title: Share a link

onboarding.subtitle: Welcome to Link & Tell
onboarding.title: New here?

profile.deleteWarn: Permanently delete your account and all of your content.
profile.description: Manage your personal information and connected accounts

draft.title: Sequence Name
draft.title-advice: Give your sequence a clear, searchable name.
draft.description-placeholder: Briefly explain what this sequence is about
draft.frameContent-placeholder: e.g., Outline the goal for this step
draft.frameContent-advice: Add the prompt, instruction, or message for this step.
draft.frameDescription-placeholder: add context or expectations for this step

emptySequences.description: Try adjusting your search filters and types, or create a new entry
emptySequences.title: No Sequences Found

sequenceError.description: The Server encountered an unexpected condition, this might be temporary connectivity issue
sequenceError.title: Unable To Load Sequences

templates.startDescription: Pick a starting point to pre-populate your sequence with suggested steps.

template1.title: Plan My Day
template1.description: Get clarity on what actually matters today.
template1.outcome: A short, realistic plan you can finish without stress.

1.description: Only tasks that move the needle. No busywork.

2.description: Rough time windows, not a perfect schedule.

template2.title: Weekly Reset
template2.description: Clear your head and start the week clean.
template2.outcome: Mental clarity and a focused direction for the week.

1.description: What worked? What didnt? One sentence each.

2.content: Choose one main goal for this week.
2.description: If this is done, the week is a win.

template3.title: Daily Health Check
template3.description: Stay aware of your body and energy.
template3.outcome: Better decisions based on how you actually feel.

3.description: Hide junk food, silence late notifications, etc.
